name: Ascinin® Anti Skin 0444
description: MEKO-Free Anti-Skinning Agent for Solvent-Based AlkydsAscinin® Anti-Skin 0444 is a phenol- and MEKO- and oxime-free anti-skinning agent for oxidatively cured solvent-based low VOC coating systems and pigment pastes. This solution relieves regulatory concerns surrounding MEKO in Europe , Canada , and other regions. MEKO-free anti-skins further enhance sustainability when used with Borchi® OXY-Coat cobalt-free high-performance catalysts for solvent-based short, medium, and long oil alkyd coatings or Borchi® Dragon high-performance cobalt-free catalyst for solvent-based high solids, long oil alkyd coatings. Other MEKO-free anti-skins include: ● Ascinin® Anti-Skin 0445 ● Ascinin® Anti-Skin 1240 ● Borchi® Nox 1640 ● Borchi® Shield .
